column5: Saw these while i was browsing the net yesterday.  I heard last year maybe that lures with LED lights or lights in general were illegal to use in Canada?  Anyone know?  This is the site  http://www.luredepotdirect.com/
They sell them at walmart but they look and feel gimmicky.
Yep there legal. I think ive seen them at walmart too. Also, I think there might be a thread on them somewhere, and there seems to be good things said about them.
I have said good things about them, as I have used them with great results on both Muskies and Pics. (in the Kawarthas before anyone asks).
